artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black on cream paper; thick black vertical lines across left and right sides of image; most of image is black with abstract cream lines suggesting leaves (?) and foliage (?); at center of image is rough shape of building with cream wall and black window, and cream lines suggesting other walls and roof; paper has rough edges

title: Landscapes
